category.description: CAST-27016 : Add a new Category to identify main Java Objects (as opposed to EJB, JSP, etc)

property.name: isInstance
property.description: Is an instance of a class or a method

property.name: toConsiderAsPackage
property.description: Consider this object as a package for resolution

property.name: toConsiderAsType
property.description: Consider this object as a type for resolution

property.name: toConsiderAsExpression
property.description: Consider this object as an expression for resolution

property.name: toConsiderAsMethod
property.description: Consider this object as a method for resolution

property.name: toConsiderAsConstructor
property.description: Consider this object as a constructor for resolution

property.name: isAProcedure
property.description: May be invoked and have arguments

category.description: Line and column beginning position in source code

category.name: CAST_Java_SymbolMetrics
category.description: All metrics that can be saved on a Java Symbol by Analyzer

property.name: numberOfQueriesInLoop
property.description: Number of queries found in a loop

property.name: numberOfStringConcatenationInLoop
property.description: Number of String Operator+ Calls in Loops

metaModel.category:
Metric computed on Methods, Constructors or Initializers by Analyzer
" "
Number of Calls to Operator== on Reference Types
Number of Calls to Operator!= on Reference Types
Number of Thread unsafe use of 'this'
Does not use instance member
Setter method
Getter method
If equals to 1 the method access only transient field
Number of exceptions instantiated in a catch block without chaining it
Total number of exceptions instantiated in a catch block

category.description: Indicates that this method reference a float

category.description: Indicates that this method opens a stream resource

category.description: Expired or Released Resource should not be used(CWE-672)

category.name: Cast_Java_AvoidUsingDeprecatedEntity
category.description: Avoid using deprecated method, constructor, field, type or package

property.name: DeprecatedEntity
property.description: Not to use the deprecated java entity

category.name: Cast_Java_AvoidWeakEncryption
category.description: Avoid Usage of weak encryption Cryptographic algorithms

property.name: WeakEncryption
property.description: reference to WeakEncryption Cryptographic algorithms Usage

category.name: Cast_Java_AvoidRSAWithoutOEAP
category.description: Avoid using RSA Cryptographic algorithms without OAEP

property.name: RSAEncryption
property.description: reference to WeakEncryption Cryptographic algorithms RSA without OEAP

category.name: Cast_Java_FinalizeMethodMetrics
category.description: Metric that concern java.lang.Object.finalize() and it's overriding methods

property.name: numberOfCallsToFinalize
property.description: Number of invalid calls to java.lang.Object.finalize() or an overriding methods

property.name: superFinalizeNotCalledInFinallyBlockOfFinalizeMethod
property.description: Indicate that super.finalize() is not called in a finally block of a finalize() method

property.name: unproperOverrideOfFinalize
property.description: Indicate that super.finalize() was not called in this finalize method.

property.name: number
property.description: Method with suspicious name or signature in inheritance tree

property.name: number
property.description: Method in which there's an instantiation inside a loop

property.name: ParentActionClass
property.description: Parent class of the class where the violation occurs.

property.name: number
property.description: Singleton or factory class when using Spring.

property.name: InheritanceWithinExternalLibraries
property.description: Save inheritance links within external libs

property.name: InstantiatedType
property.description: Static member have been instantiated with

category.name: CAST_Java_JobOptions
category.description: Job Options for a Java Analysis

property.name: enableInferenceEngine
property.description: Java Settings Option. Enable Inference Engine. Set to 1 by default

property.name: enableParametrization
property.description: Java Settings Option. Enable Parametrization. Set to 1 by default

property.name: warnAboutSharedFiles
property.description: Java Settings Option. Warn About Shared Files. Set to 0 by default

property.name: verifyClassLocation
property.description: Java Settings Option. Verify Class Location. Set to 0 by default

property.name: javaVersion
property.description: Java Settings Option. JDK Version = 220 for jdk 1.2, 230 for 1.3, 240 for 1.4, 250 for 5.0, 251 for 6.0

property.name: usePersistence
property.description: If not 0 one persistence framework is used

property.name: numberOfDimension
property.description: The number of dimensions of the type

property.name: isVarArgs
